QuestData.Title: We Have a Problem
QuestData.Description: We have a problem, $n. The Legion has come to Eredath.$b$bWhen you claimed the Sigil it was as if we announced our presence to all of Argus. The eyes of Antorus are firmly upon us.$b$bJust wait. It gets worse.$b$bVelen took Captain Fareeya and her forces into the Arinor Gardens area to search for the Crest of Knowledge. To my knowledge, they are all now behind enemy lines.$b$bCome with me to the Conservatory. We need to bring Velen and the others back before it is too late.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Turalyon at the Conservatory of the Arcane.
QuestData.RewardText: There is no room for error here, $n.

Objectives.Objective: Travel to the Conservatory of the Arcane
